entry.title: May Day
entry.content: On 1st of May, 2021. The volunteers of NSS unit of IIIT Raichur has participated in the online event “May Day”, a day to tribute to the contribution of workers all over India. Organised events such as video making, poster making and infographics.
entry.summary: On 1st of May, 2021. The volunteers of NSS unit of IIIT Raichur has participated in the online event “May Day”, a day to tribute to the contribution of workers all over India. Organised events such as video making, poster making and infographics.

entry.title: Act wise, Save Life
entry.content: On 21st of April, 2021. Volunteers have participated in the online event “Act wise, Save Life”, Where volunteers are encouraged to make a flowchart of steps involved in the first aid treatment.
entry.summary: On 21st of April, 2021. Volunteers have participated in the online event “Act wise, Save Life”, Where volunteers are encouraged to make a flowchart of steps involved in the first aid treatment.

entry.title: Elimination of Single use of Plastic

link.title: Elimination of Single use of Plastic

entry.content: On 18th of April, 2021. We have organized an online event “Elimination of Single use of Plastic”, to create awareness about how necessity it is to eliminate the plastic use.
entry.summary: On 18th of April, 2021. We have organized an online event “Elimination of Single use of Plastic”, to create awareness about how necessity it is to eliminate the plastic use.

entry.title: Road Safety
entry.content: During the Road safety week, We have organized an online event “Road Safety” to create awareness about how cautious we shall be while we are driving, riding or even walking.
entry.summary: During the Road safety week, We have organized an online event “Road Safety” to create awareness about how cautious we shall be while we are driving, riding or even walking.

entry.title: Drug Abuse-Awareness & Prevention
entry.content: On 9th of December, 2020. We have organized an online event “Drug abuse-Awareness and Prevention”.
entry.summary: On 9th of December, 2020. We have organized an online event “Drug abuse-Awareness and Prevention”.

entry.title: Constitution Day
entry.content: On 26th of November, 2020. We have organized a webinar on Indian Constitution Preamble and a few online events.
entry.summary: On 26th of November, 2020. We have organized a webinar on Indian Constitution Preamble and a few online events.

entry.title: National Education Day
entry.content: On 11th of November, 2020. To commemorate the birth anniversary of Maulana Abul Kalam Azad, we have organized a few online events, to generate awareness on the importance of Education.
entry.summary: On 11th of November, 2020. To commemorate the birth anniversary of Maulana Abul Kalam Azad, we have organized a few online events, to generate awareness on the importance of Education.

entry.title: Plantation Drive
entry.content: On 1st February 2020,Green office of IITH has organised plantation, to which NSS unit of IIIT Raichur has also volunteered.
entry.summary: On 1st February 2020,Green office of IITH has organised plantation, to which NSS unit of IIIT Raichur has also volunteered.

entry.title: Swachhata hi seva
entry.content: On 17th of october, 2019.The volunteers of NSS unit of IIIT Raichur has participated in an event “Swachhata hi seva” conducted by NSS IITH, in the hostel premises of IIT Hyderabad.
entry.summary: On 17th of october, 2019.The volunteers of NSS unit of IIIT Raichur has participated in an event “Swachhata hi seva” conducted by NSS IITH, in the hostel premises of IIT Hyderabad.
